mainSequence.step: Admin requests to update room category.
UI receives the request.
Router processes GET /room-categories/{categoryId}/update.
Controller shows the update room category form.
Repository retrieves room category details.
RoomCategoryModel fetches room category by ID.
RoomCategoryModel queries room category data from DB.
RoomCategoryModel sends back room category data to Repository.
Repository provides room category data to Controller.
Controller displays room category details form.
UI presents form to update room category to Admin.
Admin submits updated category details.
UI receives submit request.
Router processes PUT /room-categories/{categoryId}/update.
Controller updates room category with new data.
Repository updates room category details.
RoomCategoryModel updates room category data in DB.
RoomCategoryModel confirms the successful update.
Repository acknowledges the successful update.
Controller indicates the update success.
Router returns 200 OK response for the successful update.
UI displays success message to Admin.
